text: Depressigyra is a genus of sea snails, marine gastropod mollusks in the family Peltospiridae. ==Species== Species within the genus Depressigyra include: * Depressigyra globulus Warén & Bouchet, 1989 ;Species brought into synonymy: * Depressigyra planispira Warén & Bouchet, 1989: synonym of Planorbidella planispira (Warén & Bouchet, 1989) ==References== ==External links== * Category:Peltospiridae Category:Monotypic gastropod genera
title: Depressigyra
